The study 12 week study 3 group receive 0 , 8 16 fluid ounce daily vegetable juice , along education DASH ( Dietary Approaches Stop Hypertension ) diet . DOC.brief_title: Clinical Investigation Effects Vegetable Juice Treatment
DOC.criteria: ***Inclusion Criteria*** Age 40 65 yr Subject 's body mass index 18.5 34.9 kg/m2 Subject willing able comply study protocol Subject willing consume vegetablebased beverage daily three month ***Exclusion Criteria*** Physical sign health impairment Uncontrolled diabetes hypertension Pregnant lactate Active tuberculosis lung disease ( i.e . COPD ) Renal Liver disease Heart Disease , include Cardiovascular event Stroke Cushing 's syndrome Exercise trained individual History psychiatric disorder i.e . schizophrenia bipolar depression treat antidepressant within last 1 year Anxiety medication Use MAOI inhibitor within last 1 year ( e.g. , phenelzine ( Nardil ) , tranylcypromine ( Parnate ) , etc . ) Quality life score 21 Routine use prescription drug overthe counter medication , may potentially modulate outcome study ; include antibiotic , aspirin aspirincontaining formulation , COX2 inhibitor , antihistamine , corticosteroid , erectile dysfunction drug Asthma ( worsen mild moderate food allergy ) Indications substance alcohol abuse within last 3 year The volunteer undergo nicotine cessation therapy Laboratory value outside reference range determine clinically significant Dr. M. Eric Gershwin Individuals know saltsensitive hypertension History stage 1 high blood pressure define systolic > 140 diastolic > 90 , without use HTN medication MultiVitamin use OneADay essential Use herbal plantbased supplement ; omega3 fatty acid , fish oil unwilling discontinue use participate study Allergies vegetable
